Button.Name: Icon1
Button.OnPress:
sNAME=Parent.Parent.PlayerName.sName Parent.Parent.DoCommand.SELECTED=sNAME Parent.Parent.DoCommand.MYSELF=Parent.Parent.Name.localtext
COND=(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_PartyClickWindow.CancelSpellcast.checked == true) Parent.Parent.DoCommand.onpress=Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_PartyClickWindow.CastingCommands.CancelCast.cmd Parent.Parent.DoCommand.visible=COND
clearallqueuedabilities
Parent.Parent.DoCommand.onpress=Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_PartyClickWindow.CastingCommands.Click1PartySpell.cmd Parent.Parent.DoCommand.visible=true

Button.Name: Trauma
Button.OnPress:
COND=(Parent.TraumaDD.localtext > 0) Parent.CureTrauma.visible=COND
BCOND=(Parent.Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_PartyClickWindow.SmartCuring.checked == true) CCOND=(BCOND == COND) Parent.CureTrauma.visible=CCOND

Button.Name: Arcane

COND=(Parent.ArcaneDD.localtext > 0) Parent.CureArcane.visible=COND
BCOND=(Parent.Parent.Parent.DrumsUI_PartyClickWindow.SmartCuring.checked == true) CCOND=(BCOND == COND) Parent.CureArcane.visible=CCOND
